Description: Hemispherical mould-pressed glass mosaic bowl: looped lines of opaque white and wine-coloured, on a clear blue-green ground. Re-polished on the inside.
Bibliographic references: Glass 2 / Catalogue of Greek and Roman Glass, Volume 2 (655)
Harden et al 1968 / Masterpieces of Glass (43)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2018 9 May-3 Sep, Hong Kong History Museum, An Age of Luxury 2019 4 Apr-11 Aug, CaixaForum Barcelona, An Age of Luxury 2019-2020 18 Sep-12 Jan, CaixaForum Madrid, An Age of Luxury 2020 20 Feb-25 Oct, CaixaForum Zaragoza, An Age of Luxury 2023 4 May - 13 Aug, London, BM, G35, Luxury and Power: Persia to Greece
